snippet: Though seemingly unrelated, the emotionally wrenching school shooting may soften the hearts of politicians as they try to resolve the fiscal crisis.
abstract: Washington Memo; tragedy of Newtown, Conn, shooting rampage that killed 20 first graders and six of their guardians may affect how politicians approach fight to resolve  fiscal crisis; emotional toll may soften hearts, and growing distaste for politics as usual may lead to compromise and quicker resolution.
lead_paragraph: Though seemingly unrelated, the emotionally wrenching school shooting may soften the hearts of politicians as they try to resolve the fiscal crisis.

headline.seo: After School Tragedy, Partisanship Cools in Washington
headline.main: After Tragedy, Partisanship May Cool a Bit
headline.print_headline: After Tragedy, Partisanship May Cool a Bit
